channel.title: Fiction on The Guyana Brief
channel.description: Recent content in Fiction on The Guyana Brief

item.title: Speedeet & Wilar: De Chinese Restaurant Adventure
item.description: When Wilar’s uncle knows the owner of a Chinese restaurant near Kitty Cinema, the boys get a behind-the-scenes tour that changes everything Speedeet thought he knew about fried rice.

item.title: Bam-Bam Sally's Rumor Mill: The Opposition Leader Tea Is SCALDING This Week
item.description: The completely fictional whispers making rounds in Georgetown this week. All names changed, all situations imagined, all entertainment guaranteed.
